text_importexport_content: Pano unogona kuendesa kunze kwenyika zviyeuchidzo zvako.
text_notifications1: Notifications dzinofanirwa kugoneswa kushandisa chishandiso ichi:
text_help_content1: Looping Chiyeuchidzo chishandiso chinotumira zviziviso panguva dzakatsanangurwa dzenguva.
text_help_content2: Kuti uwedzere chiyeuchidzo chitsva, pfuurira pa "plus" icon. Wobva wagadzirisa iwo mavara eminda uye isa zita rechiziviso, iyo nguva (mumasekondi), iwo mavara achave ari mumuviri wekuzivisa, uye iyo URL ye icon.
text_help_content3: Kana iko kushanda kuri kushanda mubrowser, ipapo bhurawuza rinogona kudzima zviziviso kana iko application isiri kuvhurika mune inoshanda tab. Kana iyo application ikaiswa, chishandiso chako chinogona kumbomisa iko kushanda, kunyanya kana bhatiri rako remidziyo rakadzika. Nekudaro, shandisa chishandiso ichi kana chingave chiri chero rubatsiro kwauri, asi usachiishandise chero chinhu chakakosha.
text_help_content4: Mune menyu ekugadzirisa iwe unogona kushandura mutauro weiyo mushandisi interface.
text_help_content5: Kupinza kana kutumira kunze zviyeuchidzo, tinya pane yekunze / kutumira icon. Paunenge uchipinza zviyeuchidzo kubva pafaira, zviyeuchidzo zvazvino zvinodzimwa uye zvichinyorwazve.
text_help_content6: Looping Chiyeuchidzo ndeye Progressive Web Chikumbiro, zvinoreva kuti inomhanya mukati mebrowser. Kana iwe ukaiisa, nepo mabrowser zvinhu asiri kuratidzwa, ichiri kumhanya mukati mebhurawuza. Zviyeuchidzo zvinochengetwa mubhurawuza reKuchengetwa kwenzvimbo yekuyeuchidza.marcoparrone.com. localStorage inoshanda zvakanaka ne Chrome, Edge uye Firefox mabhurawuza. Mamwe mabhurawuza anogona kudzima LocalStorage mushure menguva yakati. Android nekumisikidza inoshandisa Chrome, Windows nekumisikidza inoshandisa Edge. Looping Chiyeuchidzo parizvino haina kutsigirwa paApple zvigadzirwa. Nechinangwa chekubatsira kudzivirira kurasikirwa kwezviyeuchidzo, zvinokurudzirwa kuita backup uchishandisa iyo "kutumira kunze" mashandiro, nguva dzese iwe paunogadzirisa zvausingade kurasikirwa nazvo.
text_about_content3: SOFTWARE INOPIWA "SEZVAKO", PASINA garandi YENYU RUTSI, RATIDZA KANA KUTI ZVIMWE, ZVINOSANGANISIRA ASI ASI ZVINOGONESEDZWA KUZVIMBISO ZVEVANHU, KUKWANISIRA CHINANGWA CHINOSANGANISWA NOKUSANGANA. HAPANA CHIITIKO CHINOGONESESA VANYORI KANA VABATI VEKOPI KODZESA VACHABATSIRA CHIMWE CHINANGWA, ZVINOKUVADZA KANA CHIMWE CHIMWE CHIMWE CHINANGWA, KUNA CHITSAUKO CHIBvumirano, TORT KANA ZVIMWE CHIMWE CHIMWE CHINOKOSHA, KUNZE KANA KUNE KUSANGANA NESOFTWARE KANA KUSHANDISWA KANA ZVIMWE ZVINOITWA. SOFTWARE.
text_about_content4: Iro BASA RINOGONA KUNE DZIDZISO DZINOGONESESWA NEOGOOGLE. GOOGLE RINOTAURA ZVESE ZVITARISIRO RIWANDA NEZVINODZIDZISWA KUDUDZIRO, KURATIDZA KANA KUSIMBISWA, KUSANGANISIRA ZVINOGONESESA ZVECHOKWADI, KUTENDEKA, UYE ZVINOGONESESWA MAGARANTI ECHIMANGWARO, KUKWANISIRA CHINANGWA CHIMWE CHINANGWA NEZVINANGO.
text_about_content5: Iri dandemutande reApp rakashandurwa kuti zvive nyore uchishandisa software yekushandura inofambiswa neGoogle Dudziro. Kuyedza kunonzwisisika kwakaitwa kupa shanduro chaiyo, zvisinei, hapana shanduro yakazvimiririra haina kukwana kana kuitirwa kutsiva vashanduri vevanhu. Dudziro dzinopihwa sevhisi kune vashandisi vewe marcoparrone.com webhusaiti, uye zvinopihwa "sezvazviri." Hapana garandi yerudzi rupi zvarwo, ingave yakaratidzwa kana kurehwa, inoitwa nezvekururama, kuvimbika, kana kururamisa kweshanduro dzese dzakaitwa kubva kuChirungu kuenda mune chero mumwe mutauro. Zvimwe zvemukati (zvakadai semifananidzo, mavhidhiyo, Flash, nezvimwewo) zvinogona kusanyatso dudzirwa nekuda kwekukanganisa kwesoftware yekushandura.
text_about_content6: Chinyorwa chepamutemo ndicho chinyorwa cheChirungu chewebhu webhusaiti. Chero kusanzwanana kana mutsauko unogadzirwa mushanduro hausunge uye hauna mvumo yepamutemo yekuteerera kana kuita zvinangwa. Kana paine chero mibvunzo inomuka inoenderana nekururamisa kweruzivo rwuri mune yakadudzirwa webhusaiti, tarisa kune yeChirungu vhezheni yewebhusaiti inova yepamutemo vhezheni
